rev.desc.rev.desc: Do run again if already running. Done to prevent recursion on globallist file.
Modified to NOT expire any lists in the event that the file in question is the number file and the name didn't change
Modified to not take the error exit if the expiration code doesn't terminate correctly. This routine should NEVER block an add/update/delete

Modified to not take the error exit if the expiration code doesn't terminate correctly. This routine should NEVER block an add/update/delete
